name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **.NET**, **C#**, **Web API**, and database management with **SQL** and **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Angular**, and **NestJS** for frontend development. Strong understanding of backend systems and API design.
Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and adopting Agile methodologies along with **DevOps** practices for seamless CI/CD pipelines and automated testing. Demonstrates strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication, and collaboration skills while also mentoring junior developers.
Additionally, well-versed in compliance-driven development practices and building AI/ML-powered platforms, leveraging automation and real-time processing.
